author: Tim Hume, chloe angyal
title: Pakistan Has Banned Large Prayer Services to Prevent a Coronavirus Catastrophe. Clerics Are Holding Them Anyway.
description: As Ramadan approaches, public health experts fear that crowded mosques could trigger an outbreak that would swiftly overwhelm the country’s limited healthcare infrastructure.
content:
Want the best of VICE News straight to your inbox? Sign up here.
 An influential group of Pakistani Islamic clerics has said it will flout the governments restrictions on group prayers, fueling fears that crowded mosques during Ramadan could result in a cata… [+6533 chars]
